About Me

I'm Chad and I love everything tech! I currently am a backend web developer and learning frontend development in my spare time. I have also done freelance projects creating websites for a few clients as well as creating some for myself. While in college, I had worked in retail as a manager and have plenty of experience working with customers as well as working as part of a team to accomplish tasks.


I have always had a passion for technology and learning how things work. I went to school for electrical engineering and renewable energy systems, taught myself how to develop websites and as of October 2022 I have earned my Comptia A+ certification and working toward my Comptia Network+ certification and eventually my Security+ and CCNA. I am working my way towards an IT networking career with ambitions to become a cloud engineer.


I moved to Chicago at the end of the summer in 2022 and it has turned out to be one of the best life decisions I have ever made. I have already had a lot of amazing food and there seems to be no shortage of great restaurants to try. I've also met quite a number of awesome people and have tried Malort (which wasn't as bad as I was expecting). If you have any suggestions of where I should go or do next for an authentic Chicagoan experience, let me know!
